ask_about: a pizza with any size of the following: small, medium, large, extra large
response: Of course! Could you please specify the size of the pizza you want? We have small, medium, and big sizes available.

ask_about: any of the following for toppings: mushrooms, tomato, onion, cheese, olives, pepperoni
response: Absolutely, we do have mushrooms and cheese as toppings. Would you like to add any other toppings to your pizza? We also offer pepper, ham, bacon, pepperoni, olives, corn, and chicken.
